definition: as far as possible/to do one's utmost
to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to
see 可汗[ke4 han2]
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
surname Neng
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: We have to recognize it and lessen the impact best we can, " said Gore.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须认清这一点并尽可能减轻其影响，”戈尔说。

sentences.english: Keep Transact-SQL transactions (BEGIN TRANSACTION…COMMIT/ROLLBACK) as short as possible within a stored procedure.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能的使用短小的事务在存储过程里面。

sentences.english: Research your topic and learn as much background information as you can.
sentences.chinese: 研究你的选题，尽可能多的收集背景资料。

sentences.english: Gather as much money as you can by clicking on the coins.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能多地点击硬币来捡钱。

sentences.english: Even so, he did what he could to greet his many friends throughout the world.
sentences.chinese: 但即使这样，他仍尽可能地向世界各地的友人问安。

sentences.english: As difficult as it may be at times, try not to take negative feedback personally.
sentences.chinese: 回复时尽可能不牵动个人情绪，虽然有时候很难做到。

sentences.english: Try your best to sidestep for sensitive issues like this.
sentences.chinese: 你应尽可能地回避像这类敏感的问题。

sentences.english: With regard to improving the type, use the best male you can afford.
sentences.chinese: 为了改良品相，你需要尽可能地用最好的公猫。

sentences.english: Aigner herself claims to do as much as she can to follow these guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 艾格纳声称自己会尽可能遵守这些准则。

sentences.english: Says captain smollett , as cool as can be.
sentences.chinese: 斯莫列特船长说，尽可能地保持着冷静。

sentences.english: He sweats himself to earn as much money as possible.
sentences.chinese: 他拼命干活以挣得尽可能多的钱。

sentences.english: Our teachers encouraged us to find as many ways as possible to work out this mathematics problem. 34.
sentences.chinese: 老师鼓励我们尽可能多找出儿种方法来解这道数学题。

sentences.english: Graphics should be described textually as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 图形应尽可能以文字表达。

sentences.english: Avoid the Gold Digger type at all costs.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能避开拜金类型的女孩。

sentences.english: Get organic and natural animal products as much as you can.
sentences.chinese: 尽可能地多食用有机天然畜禽产品。

sentences.english: The exception is articular cartilage and the subchondral bone, which should be preserved if at all possible.
sentences.chinese: 除了关节软骨和软骨下骨，这些应该尽可能保留。

definition: as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
so that/so as to/in order to
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
suitable/appropriate
to make every effort to/striving to do one's best
easy to/convenient for
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
as early as possible
guarantee/to guarantee/to ensure/to safeguard/to pledge/CL:個|个[ge4]
to try hard to/to strive to
to ensure/to guarantee
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
see 儘快|尽快[jin3 kuai4]
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
premise/precondition/prerequisite
to maximize
